main event: About 50 circular objects were observed over Dayton, Ohio, by a civilian witness on October 22, 1967.
interesting points: The objects were described as fish-like with tails and were colored red, green, and amber., Objects were moving from south to north at varying altitudes and speeds., The objects were scattered and some appeared to be tumbling., The conclusion suggested these objects might be weather balloons released in the area., The sighting lasted for several minutes and was reported under Project Blue Book.
